# etcd

```
./etcd --alsologtostderr=true -v=6 --host=192.168.60.128 --port=48088  --swagger-path="../third_party/swagger-ui" --storage-backend="etcd3"  --etcd-servers="192.168.60.128:2379" --etcd-certfile="/home/seanchann/bin/etcd/files/client.pem" --etcd-keyfile="/home/seanchann/bin/etcd/files/client-key.pem" --etcd-cafile="/home/seanchann/bin/etcd/files/ca.pem"
```
